ApplicationMapping.Title: TLS client mapping for the HAN interface according to TR-03116-3
ApplicationMapping.Description: Within the Smart Metering infrastructure, the communication infrastructure distinguishes between different interfaces. Depending on the particular interface, smartmeter gateways and communication partners act as TLS server or as TLS client.

ApplicationSpecificInspectionInstruction.Text: The application specific crypto requirements are defined in part 3 of [TR-03116]. This also includes the definitions for TLS.
